integration_patterns: Data streaming for real-time patient data

evidence.claim: CareATC utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure and deployment.
The company implements FHIR standards for health data interoperability.
CareATC handles HIPAA compliant data transactions, including X12 EDI.
Integration with EHR systems is a core feature for their platform.

icp.icp_reason: CareATC utilizes HIPAA X12, indicating a potential fit for API automation in healthcare.
